content.text: Match ends, Southampton 1, Aston Villa 1.
Second Half ends, Southampton 1, Aston Villa 1.
Attempt missed. Shane Long (Southampton) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Virgil van Dijk.
Substitution, Aston Villa. Gabriel Agbonlahor replaces Carlos Sánchez because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Carlos Sánchez (Aston Villa) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Shane Long (Southampton) header from the left side of the box is just a bit too high following a set piece situation.
Juanmi (Southampton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Idrissa Gueye (Aston Villa).
Hand ball by Jordan Ayew (Aston Villa).
Brad Guzan (Aston Villa) is shown the yellow card.
Attempt missed. Virgil van Dijk (Southampton) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by James Ward-Prowse with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Southampton. Conceded by Joleon Lescott.
Alan Hutton (Aston Villa) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Juanmi (Southampton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Alan Hutton (Aston Villa).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Idrissa Gueye (Aston Villa) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Oriol Romeu (Southampton) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Steven Davis.

Substitution, Southampton. Shane Long replaces Sadio Mané.
Attempt blocked. Scott Sinclair (Aston Villa) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Jordan Ayew.

Substitution, Aston Villa. Kieran Richardson replaces Leandro Bacuna because of an injury.

Substitution, Aston Villa. Ashley Westwood replaces Rudy Gestede because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Leandro Bacuna (Aston Villa) because of an injury.
Goal!  Southampton 1, Aston Villa 1. Oriol Romeu (Southampton) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by James Ward-Prowse with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Southampton. Conceded by Scott Sinclair.
Attempt saved. Juanmi (Southampton) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Steven Davis.
